mapper.select: select p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_desc, p.img_address, p.normal_price, p.promotion_price, p.priority, p.enable_status, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time, p.product_category_id, p.shop_id, pi.product_img_id, pi.product_detail_img from product p left join product_img pi on p.product_id = pi.product_id where p.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: insert into product ( product_name, product_desc, img_address, normal_price, promotion_price, priority, enable_status, create_time, last_edit_time, product_category_id, shop_id ) values ( #{productName}, #{productDesc}, #{imgAddress}, #{normalPrice}, #{promotionPrice}, #{priority}, #{enableStatus}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{productCategory.productCategoryId}, #{shop.shopId} )
